data.message: The homophobic comments are disgusting me.

replies.message: Homos disgust me. U mad bro?
god created humans to be kind and yet you are here Becky P P...
andrew you are just a small hater, i think it's probably because of your small one?
disgusting?? wanna hear about disgusting ask any of those guys or girls what they did last night?
All the Hate and "disgusting comments" are coming from the gay side posting here.
this is not what god called us to be like. read revolations about people being gay and u will find something very serious out.

homo-PHOBIC?  lmfao Umm no 1 is scared of gays, just sick  watching you people try to stick it to the straights. Instead of acting like you want rights, you act like you want war.  This is what you get, ZERO RESPECT

I'm not even gay, so being heterophobic would make no sense. Do you know what makes me mad? All the ignorant comments. 80% of people commenting were disgusted and enraged. They were all quoting the bible, but did they consider that maybe, and just maybe, that not all people are Christians? And even if they are, the bible never said anything about gay marriage being a sin, however there were very much which indicated gayness in it. It’s all about how you interpret it. But do you know what the bible says? It says that you may not mix two fabrics. So if you’re wearing denim and cotton, it’s a sin. It says that you may never have sex before marriage, and I’m pretty sure almost everybody nowadays does. So don’t go in and quote the bible when it’s convenient for you, you hypocrites. My mother does not like “gay", not the people, but the sexuality. Do you know what she does? Nothing. Because as long as SHE isn’t gay, she pretty much don’t care about what other people do. And that comes from a woman who was raised in a strict Islamic home. So if you dislike gay marriage so much, don’t get one, simple as that.

'Do not wear clothing woven of two kinds of material.' When they would mix materials in their clothing, it caused them to not have the same ventilation as a single material would, this was so that survival in the desert was easier for them.
obviously you suck to. No pun intended.
must be a homo too (no such thing as bisexual)
Yes the bible did say a man being with a man and woman being with a woman is a sin.
I think that saying there is no such thing as bisexual is an incredibly stupid thing to say tbh, cus in my experience most of the people I know have done something sexual with guys and girls :3
Also Jesse Brantley I searched it and all it said is that gay people go to hell o.O How can anyone know that?
people who are against gay marriage aren't homophobes they think it's wrong and i am with the people who are against it
